import React, { useState, useContext } from 'react' import FooterSection from '../sections/FooterSection' import MainMenuSection from '../sections/MainMenuSection' import ShowCase from '../sections/ShowCase' import UnderShowCase from '../sections/UnderShowCase' import ProductGridSection from '../sections/ProductGridSection' import TopPicks from '../sections/TopPicks' import CategoryRightSection from '../sections/CategoryRightSection' import CategoryLeftSection from '../sections/CategoryLeftSection' import CompanyServiceSection from '../sections/CompanyServiceSection' import CustomerService from "../assets/images/customer-service-icon.svg"; import CustomerSecurePayment from "../assets/images/secured-payment-icon.svg"; import CustomerDelivery from "../assets/images/delivery-truck-icon.svg"; import { FeaturedProductsContext, TopProductsContext } from '../context/contexts' const HomeView = () => { window.top.document.title = 'Fixxo.' const products = useContext(FeaturedProductsContext) const topProducts = useContext(TopProductsContext) const [LeftProducts, setLeftProducts] = useState([ { id: 13, name: "Modern Black Blouse", category: "Fashion", price: "$35.00", rating: 5, img: "https://images.pexels.com/photos/936102/pexels-photo-936102.jpeg?cs=srgb&dl=pexels-nappy-936102.jpg&fm=jpg"}, { id: 14, name: "Modern Black Blouse", category: "Fashion", price: "$35.00", rating: 5, img: "https://images.pexels.com/photos/106255/pexels-photo-106255.jpeg?cs=srgb&dl=pexels-kasuma-106255.jpg&fm=jpg"}, { id: 15, name: "Modern Black Blouse", category: "Fashion", price: "$35.00", rating: 5, img: "https://images.pexels.com/photos/968571/pexels-photo-968571.jpeg?cs=srgb&dl=pexels-igor-link-968571.jpg&fm=jpg"}, { id: 16, name: "Modern Black Blouse", category: "Fashion", price: "$35.00", rating: 5, img: "https://images.pexels.com/photos/932402/pexels-photo-932402.jpeg?cs=srgb&dl=pexels-godisable-jacob-932402.jpg&fm=jpg"} ]) return ( <>
) } export default HomeView
